Hi,

I coverted the gara.ttf, garait.ttf and garabd.ttf to gara.xml, garait.xml and 
garabd.xml using the tools FOP provides, and modified the config\userconfig.xml 
as bellow.

I didn't want to embed the "ttf" file into the PDF created, when I tried to 
creat a PDF file, I got error message "unknown font...". 

It had been working for FOP-0.20.2. It dose not work in FOP-0.20.4.

Thanks for your help.

Stanley


config\userconfig.xml:
<fonts>
 <font metrics-file="gara.xml" kerning="yes">
    <font-triplet name="Garamond" style="normal" weight="normal"/>
 </font>
 <font metrics-file="garait.xml" kerning="yes">
    <font-triplet name="Garamond" style="italic" weight="normal"/>
 </font>
 <font metrics-file="garabd.xml" kerning="yes">
    <font-triplet name="Garamond" style="normal" weight="bold"/>
 </font>
</fonts>

text:
Look at it:
> Failed to read font metrics file C:\fop-0.20.4\gara.xml : null
FOP unable to find font metrics file in C:\fop-0.20.4 directory.

<font metrics-file="gara.xml" kerning="yes">
Here you define relative path to the metrics file and it is resolved relative to
baseDir property, fix it.
You can set up baseDir property either using userconfig.xml file or using
Configuration class, see faq xml.apache.org/fop/faq.html.
